description: Starts an Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender autoscaling recommendation job. Returns recommendations for autoscaling policies that you can apply to your SageMaker endpoint.

parameters.name: InferenceRecommendationsJobName
parameters.description: The name of a previously completed Inference Recommender job.

parameters.name: RecommendationId
parameters.description: The recommendation ID of a previously completed inference recommendation. This ID should come from one of the recommendations returned by the job specified in the InferenceRecommendationsJobName field. Specify either this field or the EndpointName field.

parameters.name: EndpointName
parameters.description: The name of an endpoint benchmarked during a previously completed inference recommendation job. This name should come from one of the recommendations returned by the job specified in the InferenceRecommendationsJobName field. Specify either this field or the RecommendationId field.

parameters.name: ScalingPolicyObjective
parameters.description: An object where you specify the anticipated traffic pattern for an endpoint. MinInvocationsPerMinute (integer) --- The minimum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute. MaxInvocationsPerMinute (integer) --- The maximum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute.

nested_params.name: MinInvocationsPerMinute
nested_params.description: The minimum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute.

nested_params.name: MaxInvocationsPerMinute
nested_params.description: The maximum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute.

nested_items.name: InferenceRecommendationsJobName
nested_items.description: The name of a previously completed Inference Recommender job.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The recommendation ID of a previously completed inference recommendation.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of an endpoint benchmarked during a previously completed Inference Recommender job.

nested_items.name: TargetCpuUtilizationPerCore
nested_items.description: The percentage of how much utilization you want an instance to use before autoscaling, which you specified in the request. The default value is 50%.

nested_items.name: ScalingPolicyObjective
nested_items.description: An object representing the anticipated traffic pattern for an endpoint that you specified in the request.

nested_items.name: MinInvocationsPerMinute
nested_items.description: The minimum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute.

nested_items.name: MaxInvocationsPerMinute
nested_items.description: The maximum number of expected requests to your endpoint per minute.

nested_items.name: InvocationsPerInstance
nested_items.description: The number of invocations sent to a model, normalized by InstanceCount in each ProductionVariant. 1/numberOfInstances is sent as the value on each request, where numberOfInstances is the number of active instances for the ProductionVariant behind the endpoint at the time of the request.

nested_items.name: ModelLatency
nested_items.description: The interval of time taken by a model to respond as viewed from SageMaker. This interval includes the local communication times taken to send the request and to fetch the response from the container of a model and the time taken to complete the inference in the container.

nested_items.name: DynamicScalingConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object with the recommended values for you to specify when creating an autoscaling policy.

nested_items.name: MinCapacity
nested_items.description: The recommended minimum capacity to specify for your autoscaling policy.

nested_items.name: MaxCapacity
nested_items.description: The recommended maximum capacity to specify for your autoscaling policy.

nested_items.name: ScaleInCooldown
nested_items.description: The recommended scale in cooldown time for your autoscaling policy.

nested_items.name: ScaleOutCooldown
nested_items.description: The recommended scale out cooldown time for your autoscaling policy.

nested_items.name: ScalingPolicies
nested_items.description: An object of the scaling policies for each metric.

nested_items.name: TargetTracking
nested_items.description: A target tracking scaling policy. Includes support for predefined or customized metrics.

nested_items.name: MetricSpecification
nested_items.description: An object containing information about a metric.

nested_items.name: Predefined
nested_items.description: Information about a predefined metric.

nested_items.name: PredefinedMetricType
nested_items.description: The metric type. You can only apply SageMaker metric types to SageMaker endpoints.

nested_items.name: Customized
nested_items.description: Information about a customized metric.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the customized metric.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the customized metric.

nested_items.name: Statistic
nested_items.description: The statistic of the customized metric.

nested_items.name: TargetValue
nested_items.description: The recommended target value to specify for the metric when creating a scaling policy.
